about_the_game:
Inspired by the spirit of IconNicholson's 1998 classic web game "Snowcraft". Left click to throw, right click to parry, that's all there is to it. Enjoy the freedom of complete mouse movement that moves as fast as you do. Parry to get stronger and unlock new abilities. Battle difficult enemies and bosses that throw snowballs in mysterious ways.

  • Difficult but beatable gameplay.

  • A no-keyboard bullet hell that rewards those mighty with the mouse.

  • Feel kind of awesome by getting good at parrying.

  • Lose all your progress by getting hit in the face with snowballs over and over.

  • Pain.

  • Something cool for those who defeat the Snow Wizard.

The fate of the world rests on your snowballs.

A Message from the Developer:

Hello! I'm John, the sole creator of this game. My goal was to revive some beloved mechanics from classic flash games, hopefully stirring up a bit of nostalgia along the way.

I'd love to hear your thoughts! Whether you have feedback, questions, or run into any issues, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'll do my best to respond right away. And if you enjoyed playing Snowball Fight Game, let me know - it truly makes my day to hear from a happy player.

short_description: Dodge, parry, and throw as fast as your reflexes allow. A very difficult bullet hell that is built on parrying and pure, weightless movement—no keyboards, just the speed of your mouse.
